DBsheetParams.query: SELECT T1.EMPLOYEE_ID, T1.FIRST_NAME, T1.LAST_NAME, T1.EMAIL, T1.PHONE_NUMBER, T1.HIRE_DATE, T2.JOB_TITLE AS JOB_ID, T3.TESTNAME AS SALARY, T1.COMMISSION_PCT, LAST_NAME || ' ' || FIRST_NAME MANAGER_ID, T5.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS DEPARTMENT_ID FROM hr.EMPLOYEES T1 LEFT JOIN hr.JOBS T2 ON T1.JOB_ID = T2.JOB_ID LEFT JOIN BUMSTI.TEST T3 ON T1.SALARY = T3.TESTID LEFT JOIN HR.EMPLOYEES T4 ON T1.MANAGER_ID = T4.EMPLOYEE_ID LEFT JOIN HR.DEPARTMENTS T5 ON T1.DEPARTMENT_ID = T5.DEPARTMENT_ID

field.name: *JOB_ID
field.lookup: SELECT JOB_TITLE,JOB_ID FROM HR.JOBS ORDER BY JOB_TITLE

field.name: SALARY
field.lookup: SELECT TESTNAME SALARY,TESTID FROM TEST ORDER BY TESTNAME

field.name: MANAGER_ID
field.lookup: SELECT LAST_NAME || ' ' || FIRST_NAME MANAGER_ID,EMPLOYEE_ID FROM EMPLOYEES ORDER BY FIRST_NAME

field.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
field.lookup: SELECT DEPARTMENT_NAME,DEPARTMENT_ID FROM DEPARTMENTS ORDER BY DEPARTMENT_NAME
